briefTitle: Neurocysticercosis: Combined Treatment With Praziquantel (PZQ) and Albendazole (ABZ)
officialTitle: Antiparasitic Therapy for Neurocysticercosis: Phase II/III Study on Safety and Efficacy of Combined Treatment With Praziquantel and Albendazole

arms.label: II.- ABZ + ABZ Placebo + PZQ Placebo

summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if combination drug therapy of praziquantel and albendazole is safe and effective to cure neurocysticercosis.

primaryOutcome.measure: PK Substudy - Area Under the Curve of Albendazole in Treatment in Day 1
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 0, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 8, 10 and 12 hours post dose on Treatment day 1
